snippet: Zach Johnson putted for birdie on every hole and made seven of them for a six-under-par 67 that put him in a four-way tie for the lead through two rounds of the Tournament of Champions in Kapalua, Hawaii.
abstract: Golfers Zach Johnson is in four-way tie with Jimmy Walker, Russell Henley and Bae Sang-Moon after second-round of Tournament of Champions; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Zach Johnson putted for birdie on every hole and made seven of them for a six-under-par 67 that put him in a four-way tie for the lead through two rounds of the Tournament of Champions in Kapalua, Hawaii.
